    function groupQuery() {
        const url = base_url + "/group_name?cookie={{String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com'))}}";
        const res = java.ajax(url);
        const data = JSON.parse(res).data;

        data.forEach(group => {
            let key;
            for (key in group) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    "title": key,
                    "url": base_url +"/bookshelf2?page={{page}}&book_ids=" + group[key].join(","),
                    "style": {
                        "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                        "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        });

        if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
            groupDatas.push({
                "title": "--",
                "url": "",
                "style": {
                    "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                    "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                }
            });
        }
    }

    try {
    	java.longToast("请稍等,正在更新分组数据!");
    // 用户信息
    const userUrl = base_url + '/fquser?sessionid={{String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid"))}}';
    const userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
    const userInfo = JSON.parse(userRes).data.name;

            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
            }

let info;

let key = '';

try {
	key = String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
	key = getKey(key);
        } catch (e) {key='';}
if (key != ''){key = '✅️已登录';} else {key = '‼️⛔️您还未登录书山账号哦，可以点击右上角登录♨️';}
info = `  🎚当前服务器：${base_url}
🪄书山账号：${key}
🎴当前来源：${sources}
🗂当前模式：${tab}\n`
if (tab =='听书') {info = info+	'🔊当前音色：'+ getArguments(source.getVariable(),'tone_id',String(source.bookSourceComment))+'\n'+book_tts+'\n‎';}

if (`${score}`) {info = info +  `✨书籍评分：${score}\n`};
if (`${media}`) {info = info +  `📌出版媒体：${media}\n`};
if (`${abstract}`) {info = info +  `‎
📚书籍简介：
${abstract}\n`};
if (`${book_review}`) {info = info +  `‎\n${book_review}\n`};

</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
let res =java.hexDecodeToString(result).split('书山融合2.1');

let item_id = res[0];
let tab = res[1];
let title = res[2];
let sources = res[3];
let tone_id = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'tone_id',String(source.bookSourceComment));
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'server',String(source.bookSourceComment));
let key = '';
try {
	key = String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
	key = getKey(key);
 } catch (e) {key='';}
        
        
let device,device_type;
try {
    device = java.androidId();
    device_type='安卓';
} catch (e) {
    try{
device = java.deviceID();
device_type='苹果';
}catch (e) {device = '';
device_type='安卓';
}
}


let content_url;
if (tab=='小说') {
	content_url= `/content?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key}`;
 } 
 else if (tab=='听书') {
 	 	content_url= `/audio?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&tone_id=${tone_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key}`;
 	} else if (tab=='漫画') {
 		 	content_url=	`/pic?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key}`;
 		} else if (tab=='短剧') {
 		content_url=	`/video?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key}`;
 			}
 let data = java.ajax(base_url+content_url);
 try {
if (JSON.parse(data).msg) {
	java.toast(JSON.parse(data).msg);
	}}catch (e) {}
let content = JSON.parse(data).content;
if (device_type=='安卓' && tab  == '短剧'){
	data = {'content':`【右上角刷新】开启播放(下一集请切换下一章刷新)\n播放直链：\n${content}`}
	data = JSON.stringify(data);
	 if (book.durChapterIndex===chapter.index){
	 //let b64 = java.base64Encode(generateVideoPage(title,content));
	// let dataUrl = `data:text/html;base64,${b64}`;
	// 	java.startBrowser(dataUrl,title);
	 	java.startBrowser(content,title);
	 	java.toast('正在加载视频...');
	}};

data;
</js>

ruleSearch.lastChapter:
<js>
function fq_last() {
	let url = `https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id={{$.book_id}}`;
        let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data[0]; 
        return last["last_chapter_title"]+" · "+java.timeFormat(last["last_chapter_update_time"]*1000);
	
	}

	
function qm_last() {
	let headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
	sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'

params={'id':{{$.book_id}}, 'imei_ip':'2937357107','teeny_mode':0}

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);  
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);  
    }  
  }  
  return paramStr;  
};
paramSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key));
headerSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))
params['sign']=paramSign;
headers['sign']=headerSign;
let url = "https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/book/detail?"+urlEncode(params);
option = {'headers':headers};

let title = result.title;

 device = java.androidId();
 device_type='安卓';
} catch (e) {
 device_type='苹果';
};

if (tab=='小说') {
	if (device_type == '安卓') {
    book.type = 8;} else {

    	}
 } 
 else if (tab=='听书') {

    	book.type = 1;

    book.type = 64;} else {
    	book.type = 2;
    	}
 	 } else if (tab=='短剧') {

    book.type = 8;} else {
    	book.type = 3;
    	}
 		 			} else {
 		 				if (device_type == '安卓') {
    book.type = 8;} else {
    	book.type = 0;
    	}		
 		 				}

let content_url = `${item_id}书山融合2.1${tab}书山融合2.1${title}书山融合2.1${sources}`;
content_url= java.base64Encode(content_url);
content_url= `data:;base64,${content_url},{"type":"qingtian"}`;
</js>

<js>

try {
	key2 = String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
	key2 = getKey(key2);
        } catch (e) {key2='';}

let sources = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'source',String(source.bookSourceComment));
`${base_url}/search?title={{key}}&tab=${media}&source=${sources}&key=${key2}`
</js>

<js>
function createSign(params) {
	var str = '';
	Object.keys(params).sort().forEach((key) => {
		if (params[key]) {
			str += `&${key}=${params[key]}`;
		}
	});
	return CryptoJS.HmacMD5(str.slice(1), 'c17DTXDNhSc0ea9AQMdUUQ==').toString();
}

const timestamp = Date.now();
let url = "https://api.next.bspapp.com/client";
let body = {
	"method": "serverless.auth.user.anonymousAuthorize",
	"params": "{}",
	"spaceId": "mp-a23ce835-47fc-4856-9c1a-5648136d3829",
	"timestamp": timestamp
};

let sign = createSign(body);

let headers = {
	"Content-Type": "application/json",
	"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0; Nexus 5 Build/MRA58N) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/129.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
	"x-serverless-sign": sign
};

let response = JSON.parse(java.post("https://api.next.bspapp.com/client",JSON.stringify(body),headers).body());

if(response.success){
	const accessToken = response.data.accessToken;
	const idValue = baseUrl.match(/id=([^&]+)/)[1];

	const timestamp1 = Date.now();
	const params = JSON.stringify({
		"functionTarget": "DCloud-clientDB",

			"command": {
				"$db": [
					{ "$method": "collection", "$param": ["bl-time-novel"] },
					{ "$method": "where", "$param": [`_id=='${idValue}'`] },
					{ "$method": "field", "$param": ["_id,cover_url,title,tags,word_number,view_count,excerpt,introduction,creator_id,creator_name,creator_avatar,is_completed,novel_status,contributor"] },
					{ "$method": "skip", "$param": [0] },
					{ "$method": "limit", "$param": [20] },
					{ "$method": "get", "$param": [{}] }
				]
			}
		}
	});
	let body1 = {
		"method": "serverless.function.runtime.invoke",
		"params": params,
		"spaceId": "mp-a23ce835-47fc-4856-9c1a-5648136d3829",
		"timestamp": timestamp1,
		"token": accessToken
	};
	let sign1 = createSign(body1);
	let headers1 = {
		"Content-Type": "application/json",
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0; Nexus 5 Build/MRA58N) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/129.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
		"x-basement-token": accessToken,
		"x-serverless-sign": sign1
	};
	let response1 = JSON.parse(java.post("https://api.next.bspapp.com/client",JSON.stringify(body1),headers1).body());
	
	const timestamp2 = Date.now();
	const params2 = JSON.stringify({
	  "functionTarget": "DCloud-clientDB",
	  "functionArgs": {
		"command": {
		  "$db": [
			{ "$method": "collection", "$param": ["bl-time-chapter"] },
			{ "$method": "where", "$param": ["novel_id=='" + idValue + "'&&chapter_status==1"] },
			{ "$method": "field", "$param": ["_id,chapter_title,last_modify_date"] },
			{ "$method": "orderBy", "$param": ["chapter_index asc"] },
			{ "$method": "skip", "$param": [0] },
			{ "$method": "limit", "$param": [500] },
			{ "$method": "get", "$param": [{}] }
		  ]
		}
	  }
	});
	let body2 = {

		"params": params2,
		"spaceId": "mp-a23ce835-47fc-4856-9c1a-5648136d3829",
		"timestamp": timestamp2,

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.java.util 
);
with(javaImport){
    let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b");
    let ALGORITHM = "DES"; 
    let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding";
    let CHARSET = "utf-8";
    let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN");


function decode(data){
let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes());
let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks);
let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM);
let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET));
cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv);
return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET);

}
}
//DES解密结束

content=java.getElement("$.content");
saybody=java.getString("$.sayBody");
say=saybody!=""?"\n作者有话要说：\n"+saybody:"";
if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){
result=String(decode(content)+say);
}else{result=content+say}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
$=result;
title=$.chaptername;
title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'');
intro=$.chapterintro;
java.put("intro",intro);
vip=$.isvip!='0';
lock=$.islock!='0';
type=$.chaptertype=='1';
num=!type?'第{{$.chapterid}}章 ':'';
if(title.match(/[一二三四五六七八九十百千万\d]+\s*章|^\d+[、\.\s]|chapter\s*\d+/i)){
num=''
}else{num=num}
l=lock?'[锁]':'';
result=num+title+l;

//不显示卷名
result=!type?result:'';
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
z = source.getVariable().split(",");
if(!(parseInt(z[0])>0)){
  let regex = /var c="([^"]*)"/;
let dd = result.match(regex)[1]

let j = java.base64Decode(dd);
  //java.log(j)
  jja=String(j).replace(/^[^-]*-/,"-")
  if(/=/.test(jja)){jj=jja.replace(/=[^=]*$/,"");}else{jj=jja.replace(/_[^_]*$/,"");}
  
m=jj.replace(/-/g,"PHA+").replace(/_/g,"8L3A+");
n=java.getString("@@#chaptercontent@p@html");
n+	java.base64Decode(m)

  
}else if(parseInt(z[0])){
  src=eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
result=java.getString("id.chaptercontent@html",src)
result
}

</js>

<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'');
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let keys = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (keys) {
            let keyParts = keys.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                keys = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', keys);
                return keys;
            }
        }
    }
    return '';  
 }

let open_argument = source.getVariable();
let base_url = getArguments(open_argument,'server');
let ms = getArguments(open_argument,'tone_id');
let key = getArguments(open_argument,'key');
if (!key) {
	key = gets_key();
	}

搜索时可使用  关键词@@标签  来进行附加标签搜索。 前面为搜索的关键词 ，@@后面的是标签，多个标签之间用 逗号( ,， )隔开。
关键词留空可直接搜索标签

loginUrl:
<js>
function login() {
	let loginName = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("邮箱");
	let password = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("密码");
	if (loginName && password) {
		let body = `loginName=${loginName}&password=${password}`;
		let url = source.bookSourceUrl + 'api/console/app/login';
		let res = java.post(url, body, {});
		let responseBody = JSON.parse(res.body());
		if (responseBody.result == "fail") {
			throw new Error(responseBody.msg)
		} else {
			let header = JSON.stringify({
				"token": responseBody.model.token,
				"uaa-userid": responseBody.model.id,
			});
			source.putLoginHeader(header);
		}
	}
}
//账号注册
function registerAccount() {
	let loginName = result.get("邮箱");
	let password = result.get("密码");
	let checkCode = result.get("邮箱验证码");
	if (loginName && password && checkCode) {
		let body =  `loginName=${loginName}&password=${password}&nickName=&checkCode=${checkCode}&recommendCode=`;
		let url = source.bookSourceUrl + 'api/console/app/register';
		let res = java.post(url, body, {});
		let responeBody = JSON.parse(res.body());
		if (responeBody.msg) {
			java.toast(responeBody.msg);
			java.log(responeBody.msg);
		}
	}
}
//获取验证码
function getVerificationCode() {
	let loginName = result.get("邮箱");
	if (loginName) {
		let body = `email=${loginName}`;
		let url = source.bookSourceUrl + 'api/console/app/sendCheckCode';
		let res = java.post(url, body, {});
		let responeBody = JSON.parse(res.body());
		if (responeBody.msg) {
			java.toast(responeBody.msg);
			java.log(responeBody.msg);
		}
	}
}

function searchExcludeTags() {
	let excludeTags = this.getExcludeTags();
	//java.log(`当前标签屏蔽：${excludeTags}`);
	java.longToast(`当前标签屏蔽：${excludeTags}`);
}

function resetExcludeTags() {
	let data = getData();
	data.ExcludeTags = [];
	setData(data);
	//java.log("标签屏蔽已重置");
	java.toast("标签屏蔽已重置");
}

function setExcludeTags(tag) {
	let data = getData();
	if (!data.ExcludeTags) data.ExcludeTags = [];
	let index = data.ExcludeTags.findIndex(item => item == tag);
	if (index == -1) {
		data.ExcludeTags.push(tag);
	} else {
		data.ExcludeTags.splice(index, 1);
	}
	//java.log(`标签 ${tag} 已${index == -1 ? "添加": "移除" }屏蔽`);
	java.toast(`标签 ${tag} 已${index == -1 ? "添加": "移除" }屏蔽`);
	setData(data);
}
</js>

function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'');
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let key = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (key) {
            let keyParts = key.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                key = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', key);
                return key;
            }
        }
    }
    return '';  
 }

                        "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        });

        if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
            groupDatas.push({
                "title": "--",
                "url": "",
                "style": {
                    "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                    "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                }
            });
        }
    }

    try {
    	java.longToast("请稍等,正在更新分组数据!");
    // 用户信息
    const userUrl = base_url + '/fquser?sessionid={{String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid"))}}';
    const userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
    const userInfo = JSON.parse(userRes).data.name;

    infoData = [
        {
            "title": `${userInfo}个人中心`,
            "url": "",
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
            }
        }
    ];
    groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
    java.longToast("网络错误或登录失效或阅读版本过低，请重新登录番茄重试！");
    }

}

// 合并数据
let datas1 = [
    {
        "title": "番茄官方书架",
        "url": base_url + "/bookshelf?page={{page}}&cookie={{cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com')}}",
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "大灰狼阅读记录",
        "url": base_url + "/bookshelf?page={{page}}&key=" + keys,
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
        }
    }
];

const datas2 = [{
        "title": "书籍排行榜 ٩( ˃̶͈̀௰˂̶͈́ )و",
        "url": "",
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "推荐榜单",
        "url": base_url + '/discover?page={{page}}&side_type=10',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "完结榜单",
        "url": base_url +'/discover?page={{page}}&side_type=11',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "热搜榜单",
        "url": base_url +'/discover?page={{page}}&side_type=12',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "黑马榜单",
        "url": base_url +'/discover?page={{page}}&side_type=13',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "爆更榜单",
        "url": base_url + '/discover?page={{page}}&side_type=15',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "巅峰榜单",
        "url": base_url +'/discover?page={{page}}&type=0',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "男频精选",
        "url": base_url + '/discover?page={{page}}&type=2',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "女频精选",
        "url":base_url + '/discover?page={{page}}&type=3',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "每周推荐",
        "url": base_url +'/discover?page={{page}}&type=1',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    }];
const datas = datas1.concat(infoData, groupDatas, datas2);


function generateUrl(k, k1, sort, status) {
    return `${base_url}/discover?offset={{(page - 1) * 10}}&limit=10&tags=${data[k][k1]}&status=${status}&sort=${sort}`;
}

for (let k in data) {
    datas.push({
        "title": "❦ " + k + "生频道 ❧",
        "url": "",
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
        }
    });
    for (let k1 in data[k]) {
        datas.push({
            "title": '༺༴ '+k1+' ༴༻',
            "url": '',

                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
            }

        datas.push({

            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 0, 'ALL'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });
        
        datas.push({
            "title": "评分排行",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 1, 'ALL'),

        datas.push({

            }
}



JSON.stringify(datas);
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'');
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let keys = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (keys) {
            let keyParts = keys.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                keys = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', keys);
                return keys;
            }
        }
    }
    return '';  
 }

let open_argument = source.getVariable();
let base_url = getArguments(open_argument,'server');
let media = getArguments(open_argument,'media');
let key = getArguments(open_argument,'key');
if (!key) {
	key = gets_key();
	}

                    }

exploreUrl:
<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'');
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let keys = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (keys) {
            let keyParts = keys.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                keys = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', keys);
                return keys;
            }
        }
    }
    return '';  
 }

let open_argument = source.getVariable();
let base_url = getArguments(open_argument,'server');
let media = getArguments(open_argument,'media');
let key = getArguments(open_argument,'key');
if (!key) {
	key = gets_key();
	}

<js>
if(/netUrl/.test(baseUrl)){
  b = source.getKey();
  url1 = String(baseUrl).replace(/netUrl\//,'');
  page = String(java.ajax(url1)).match(/\(第1\/(\d+)页\)/)[1];
  url2 = String(url1).replace(/(\d+).html/,"$1_"+page+".html");
  url = b+java.ajax(url2).match(/<a href="([^"]+)">下一节<\/a>/)[1];
  java.put('url',url);
result=java.ajax(url);
}
result
</js>.RBGsectionThree-content p@textNodes

<js>
list=[];
base = source.getKey();
lis=java.getElements('section .BCsectionTwo-top-chapter a');
for(i in lis){
	url=lis[i].attr('href');
	/javascript/.test(url)?url='/netUrl'+lis[i-1].attr('href'):url;
	url=base+url;
	list.push({"text":lis[i].text(),"href":url})
}
list
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
sort=[];
	push=(title,url,type,fp)=>sort.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
				layout_flexGrow: fp,
				layout_flexBasisPercent: type
			}
	});
	u="https://apiv2hans.aixdzs.com/sort"
	xx=(a,b)=>{
		return `list,{"method": "POST","body":'{"bookTypeId":"${a}","type": "${b}","pageNum": "{{page}}"}'}`;
	}
	fls = JSON.parse(java.post(u,'',{}).body());
	push("最新",'',1,1)
	for(f of fls.data.allType){
		push(f.categoryName,u+xx(f.bookTypeId,1),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("大热",'',1,1)
	for(l of fls.data.allType){
		push(l.categoryName,u+xx(l.bookTypeId,2),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	//完本:3
	JSON.stringify(sort);
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
s="2c6689f91ee4d4e87d798397d47310ebbe1dad79ixdzs";
for (i = 0, h = ""; i < 8; i++) {
	x="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789";
	r = parseInt(Math.random() * (36 - 0 +1) + 0, 10);
	h += x.charAt(r);
}
a=String(Math.round(new Date()));
sha = s + h + a + h;
sha1 = java.digestHex(sha,'SHA-1');

b = baseUrl.match(/"chapterId":(\d+),"bookId":"(\d+)"/)
u=source.getKey().match(/([^\#]+)\#/)[1];
url = u + "/chapter/content,";
post=`{
  "method": "POST",
  "body":'{"chapterId": ${b[1]},"bookId":"${b[2]}"}',
  "headers":{"checkSumDTO":'{"appid":"ixdzs","checksum":"${sha1}","curtime":"${a}","nonce":"${h}"}'}
}`

result = java.ajax(url+post);
</js>$.data.chapter.chapterContent

};

//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);

    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>

建议登录

酷安 @吉王义昊
GitHub：https://github.com/jiwangyihao/source-j-legado

# 关于许可的额外声明（在线版本参见 GitHub，以在线版本为准）

- 当许可证与本声明冲突时，以本声明为准；
- 对于本仓库中的任意代码片段：按照 `MPL 2.0` 中有关约定执行；
- 对于本仓库中的某一完整书源的转载或二次开发，需满足以下全部条件：
  - 在[本仓库](https://github.com/jiwangyihao/source-j-legado)的 `issue` 中提出请求并具体说明转载地址、二次开发后的书源开源地址以及其他必要信息；
  - 等待原作者（即本仓库的初始所有者和初始代码贡献者 [@jiwangyihao](https://github.com/jiwangyihao)）查看并通过 `issue` 或依据原作者要求更改转载方式或补充更详细的信息。
  - 考虑到本项目弃坑的可能，新 `issue` 开启后超过 20 个工作日原作者没有回复或者原作者回复要求更改的 `issue` 在更改后超过 20 个工作日原作者没有回复即视为原作者通过该 `issue`：
    - 此处的 `issue` 仅包括在[本仓库](https://github.com/jiwangyihao/source-j-legado)开启的，处于「开启状态」的 issue。（也就是说，请不要在已经关闭的 issue 中回复）。
    - 对于此种方式通过的 issue，转载/二次开发者仍应当遵守本声明中已经写明的相关约定。
  - 不得上传至源仓库或整理至`非轻小说专用`的书源合集中并应当避免其他人将转载/二次开发版本上传至源仓库或整理至`非轻小说专用`的书源合集中：
    - 关于轻小说的定义的额外说明：不包括国内的原创网络文学作品（如 `SF 轻小说` 中的原创轻小说以及`起点中文网`中标签包含轻小说的作品）。
    - 轻小说专用的定义：有且仅有想看轻小说的人可能会添加。
  - 必须在转载/二次开发地址的明显位置完整包含本声明的全部内容。
  - 必须保留源注释中原有的更改记录。

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
info = JSON.parse(result).data.content;
result=JSON.parse(decode(info));

source_url = baseUrl.replace('/details/','/source/');
source_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(source_url)).data.content;
$ = JSON.parse(decode(source_info));

v=String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:0;
x=parseInt(x)<$.length?x:0;

result.updated_at = $[x].updated_at;
result.last_chapter_name = $[x].last_chapter_name;
result.tocUrl = source.getKey().replace('//s','//catalog')+"/"+$[x].site_path;
result.image = source.getKey().replace('//s','//res') + '/'+result.image;


if($.length>1){
		y = '\n📌使用说明： 根据序号设置书籍变量来切换来源(默认0)\n🎯当前源：序号🔺'+x+'🔻【'+$[x].site_name+'】'+(x==0?' (默认)':'');
for(i in $){
		y += '\n❤序号🔺'+i+'🔻【'+$[i].site_name+'】 \n选用率：'+$[i].choose+' \n更新时间： '+$[i].updated_at+'\n最新章节： '+$[i].last_chapter_name;
	}
result.remark += y
}


result = JSON.stringify(result);
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.name

eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));

if(result.book[0]==undefined){
sourl = source.getKey()+"/v1/lists.api?keyword="+java.get('key');
result = JSON.parse(java.ajax(sourl)).data;	
}
}	
result = JSON.stringify(result);

{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content##^\d+\.|正文卷.|正文.|VIP卷.|默认卷.|卷_|VIP章节.|免费章节.|章节目录.|最新章节.|[\(（【].*?[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字].*?[】）\)]}}•{{@@[property$=update_time]@content##\s.*}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

//分类生成
	function parse(data,y){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	  try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
	  try {tag = args[3];
u=tag=="w"?'https://cxb-pro.cread.com/cx/new/catelistnew?uid=127995117&cnid=10013&version=8.1.4&flid='+parseInt(url/10)*10+'&thirdCateId='+url+'&sortType=1&bookStatus='+y+'&wordnumType=0&pageSize=20&curpage={{page}}':y;
 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}
	
	
function FlexBox(title, url, num){
	let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
		 
		 
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
		
		分类list = 开启的分类.split(",")

var 分类result = [];
	
  var i=0;
	 if(分类list[i]<=7){
["🔖男频🔖"].forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x)))
		})
}
   else if(分类list[i]>=8){
	["🔖女频🔖"].forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x)))
		})
		}
	
			
for(i in 分类list){
	 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(分类[分类list[i]]+"🍁连载🔖::::1")))
	a = eval(分类[分类list[i]]+"连载");
	a.forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x,连载分类)))
		})
		
	 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(分类[分类list[i]]+"🍁完结🔖::::1")))
	b = eval(分类[分类list[i]]+"完结");
	b.forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x,完结分类)))
		})
	}
JSON.stringify(分类result)

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var og = (selector) =>
  J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content');

var book = {
  name: og('novel:book_name'),
  author: og('novel:author'),
  kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status'),
  latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name') + ' ' + String(og('novel:update_time')).replace(/(\d+-\d+-\d+).*/, '$1').replace(new RegExp('(·s*)?([^\\d-])?(\\d{2})?'+String(new Date().getFullYear()).slice(-2)+'-'),'$1$2'),
  cover: og('image'),
  intro: J.select('#intro p').eq(0).html(),
};

book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('url'),
};
book;
</js>

<js>
let id = result.match(/\{siteid:'(\d+)',bid:'(\d+)',cid:'(\d+)'\}/);
if (id) {
    let body = "siteid=" + id[1] + "&bid=" + id[2] + "&cid=" + id[3];
    let path = "novelsearch/chapter/transcode.html,";
    let option = {
        "method": "POST",
        "body": String(body)
    };
    java.ajax(String(source.bookSourceUrl + path + JSON.stringify(option)))
}
</js>

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data)
//java.log(decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data))
</js>result

<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
type = [
    '全部',
    '都市',
    '出版',
    '剧情',
    '恋爱',
    '动作',
    '校园',
    '恐怖',
    '耽美',
    '搞笑',
    '爱情',
    '生活'
];
tag = [
    '全部',
    '都市',
    '出版漫画',
    '剧情',
    '恋爱',
    '动作',
    '校园',
    '恐怖',
    '耽美',
    '搞笑',
    '爱情',
    '生活'
];
End = `{{get('end',Get('q'))}}`;
for (i in type) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?tag=${tag[i]}${End}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(type[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (type.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (type.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>

<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

bookSourceComment:
只看楼主
◎编辑书籍详情页，在简介内容填上 【只看楼主】  保存，刷新书籍页（有已缓存的正文记得正文也要刷新）
◎内容只有楼主发帖，无作者名时间等
去空行
◎层与层之间有一行空行，不想要空行的话
◎就在书籍详情页的简介内容填上【去空行】
◎只看楼主跟去空行随便怎么写，写对字就行
发现规则url
贴吧名::https://tieba.baidu.com/mo/q/m?word=贴吧名（不要写吧字）&page_from_search=index&tn6=bdISP&tn4=bdKSW&tn7=bdPSB&lm=16842752&lp=6093&sub4=%E8%BF%9B%E5%90%A7&pn={{(page-1)*30}}

exploreUrl:
<js>
//一行个数
var nums = 4 ;
//分隔符
var separator = '::'

//标题::链接::一行个数::分类

all=[
"----------     🏷标签     ----------::::1",
"进击的巨人::进击的巨人::::a"
];

//@天天gg@酷安 下面不要动
function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"https://zhidao.baidu.com/msearch/ajax/getsearchlist?word="+url+"&pn=10":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];
 u=tag=="a"?'https://zhidao.baidu.com/msearch/ajax/getsearchlist?word='+url+'&pn=10':u;

 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))

<js>
//一行个数
var nums = 4 ;
//分隔符
var separator = '::'

//标题::链接::一行个数::分类

all=[
"----------     🏷标签     ----------::::1",
"进击的巨人::进击的巨人::::a"
];

//@天天gg@酷安 下面不要动
function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"https://zhidao.baidu.com/msearch/ajax/getsearchlist?word="+url+"&pn=10":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];
 u=tag=="a"?'https://zhidao.baidu.com/msearch/ajax/getsearchlist?word='+url+'&pn=10':u;

 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

<js>
function generateUrl() {
    var i;
    do {
        i = Math.floor(Math.random() * 99999);
    } while (i === 0);
    var key = java.key; // 假设这是一个全局变量或者在上下文中已经定义
    return "/class/" + i + "_1/?p=" + key;
}

finalUrl = generateUrl();

</js>

bookSourceComment:
登陆阅读已购vip章节为空时
试试书籍详情页  源变量填：1
清除缓存再刷新

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  flag=source.getVariable()=="1"?true:false
  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.data.vs.forEach((booklet) => {
    array.push({ 
    	    name:String(booklet.vN),
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.cs.forEach((chapter) => {
    	  vip = chapter.sS!="1"?"🔒":""
    	  href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/`+baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]+`/`+chapter.id+`/`;
    	  href=flag?href+",{'webView': true}":href
      array.push({
        name: String(vip+chapter.cN),
        url: href,
        time:"更新时间:"+String(chapter.uT)+"  字数:"+String(chapter.cnt),
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.java.util 
);
with(javaImport){
    let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b");
    let ALGORITHM = "DES"; 
    let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding";
    let CHARSET = "utf-8";
    let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN");


function decode(data){
let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes());
let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks);
let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM);
let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET));
cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv);
return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET);

}
}
//DES解密结束

content=java.getElement("$.content");
saybody=java.getString("$.sayBody");
say=saybody!=""?"\n作者有话要说：\n"+saybody:"";
if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){
result=String(decode(content)+say);
}else{result=content+say}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
$=result;
title=$.chaptername;
title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'');
intro=$.chapterintro;
java.put("intro",intro);
vip=$.isvip!='0';
lock=$.islock!='0';
type=$.chaptertype=='1';
num=!type?'第{{$.chapterid}}章 ':'';
if(title.match(/[一二三四五六七八九十百千万\d]+\s*章|^\d+[、\.\s]|chapter\s*\d+/i)){
num=''
}else{num=num}
l=lock?'[锁]':'';
result=num+title+l;

//不显示卷名
result=!type?result:'';
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  flag=source.getVariable()=="1"?true:false
  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.data.vs.forEach((booklet) => {
    array.push({ 
    	    name:String(booklet.vN),
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.cs.forEach((chapter) => {
    	  vip = chapter.sS!="1"?"🔒":""
    	  href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/`+baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]+`/`+chapter.id+`/`;
    	  href=flag?href+",{'webView': true}":href
      array.push({
        name: String(vip+chapter.cN),
        url: href,
        time:"更新时间:"+String(chapter.uT)+"  字数:"+String(chapter.cnt),
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

header:
<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('url'),
};
book;
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: name

bookSourceComment:
最新的Releases版本登录有Bug，但不影响正常登录，建议使用3.23.073011或之前的版本
源特性：
可登录，可以看VIP章节（不是图片），不支持购买
书架（只有小说）登录后才能用
签到暂不可用，分支小说（对话小说）、漫画也不能看
之后的打算：
不考虑支持分支小说（想看的话用app吧）
漫画我会考虑重新写一个源
其他的有时间在修

ruleSearch.author: .author@text##\/.*
ruleSearch.lastChapter: .new@text##正文卷.|正文.|VIP卷.|默认卷.|卷_|VIP章节.|免费章节.|章节目录.|最新章节.|[\(（【].*?[求更票谢乐发订合补加架字修Kk].*?[】）\)]

ruleToc.chapterName:
text##^\d+\.|（.*合.*|（含.*|\(.*合.*|\(含.*
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节|免费章节.|章节目录)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

result?result:'无法获取内容？
1.编辑书源添加自己的账号信息，找到目录列表规则，按提示添加账号信息
2.如果添加了账号信息仍然无法获取内容，请尝试刷新或更新账号信息（方式二）
3.必要说明：如果使用方式一添加了账号信息，每次打开新的书籍详情页或刷新正文都会重新获取账号信息，因此之前获取的书籍正文的链接将会失效，因此建议全文下载或者按2操作
必要说明：在使用本源前，请考虑到使用本源可能造成的账号封禁等问题'

$.returnObject[0].content@js:
result?result:'无法获取内容？
1.编辑书源添加自己的账号信息，找到目录列表规则，按提示添加账号信息
2.如果添加了账号信息仍然无法获取内容，请尝试刷新或更新账号信息（方式二）
3.必要说明：如果使用方式一添加了账号信息，每次打开新的书籍详情页或刷新正文都会重新获取账号信息，因此之前获取的书籍正文的链接将会失效，因此建议全文下载或者按2操作
必要说明：在使用本源前，请考虑到使用本源可能造成的账号封禁等问题'

bookSourceComment:
！！！请务必先登录
！请注意：
未经许可，请勿在其他平台转载此书源
可能会获得许可的转载方式：整理至「轻小说专用」的书源合集中
不可能获得许可的转载方式：上传至源仓库或整理至「非轻小说专用」的书源合集中
「轻小说专用」的定义：
有且仅有想看轻小说的人可能会添加
不论何种方式都需先征求书源作者的许可！
2023.10.12
酷安 @吉王义昊
源仓库里那个规则已经旧到完全无法导入了（怕不是2.0的）
大概试了下，原来的那些规则倒是都还能用
不过还有点bug，而且很多信息不全
就稍微完善了一下
- 处理了搜索列表规则，现在不会和详情页混淆
- 处理了标签的展示形式
- 完善了详情页规则
- 目录获取并标识卷名
- 解决了旧规则的乱码问题
- 为已下架的书添加了「已下架」标签
- 完善了发现页
2023.10.13
酷安 @吉王义昊
- 解决了部分书籍无法正常加载的问题
- 现在已下架的书也可以正常阅读了
- 解决了已下架的书在发现页无法正常加载的问题
2023.10.14
酷安 @吉王义昊
- 解决了发现页中排行榜获取到的链接不对的问题
2023.10.22
酷安 @吉王义昊
- 现在可以同时搜索作者和书名（但每一页的加载时间都增加至少5秒）
2023.10.25
酷安 @吉王义昊
- 使用 cookie 中的时间计算延迟
- 现在连续搜索时会自动延迟
- 添加延迟时提示消息

<js>
//DES加密开始
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util  
);
with(javaImport){
function encryptByDES(massage, keydata) {
        let cipher = Cipher.getInstance("DES");
        let keySpec = new DESKeySpec(String(keydata).getBytes());
         let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
         let key = keyFactory.generateSecret(keySpec);      
        cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE, key);
        return Base64.encodeToString(cipher.doFinal(String(massage).getBytes()),Base64.NO_WRAP)
}
}
//DES加密结束

var deskey = 'web@hzlq';
var userId='0';
function getPostUrl(data,type) {
var url = 'http://m.ndlib.cn/nlc_read_home/service.do,';
var md5Key = 'library_2016@hzlq';
value = {
    siteId: 1,
    data:String(encryptByDES(JSON.stringify(data), deskey)),
    userId: userId,
    fromSource: 3,
    osType: 5,
    version: "1.0.1",
    versionCode: 10001,
    timeStamp: data.timeStamp,
    hashCode: String(java.md5Encode(data.timeStamp + md5Key))
}
var option={
"method":"POST",
"body":'cmd='+type+'&value=' + encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(value))
}
return url + JSON.stringify(option);
}
var data ={
    timeStamp:Date.now(),
    bigType:"0",
    pageSize:100,
    pageNum:parseInt(java.get('page'))
};

if(baseUrl.match(/categoryId/)){
data.categoryId=baseUrl.match(/categoryId=(\d+)/)[1];
url=getPostUrl(data,'qryCategoryResList')
}else{
data.content=String(java.get('key'));
url=getPostUrl(data,'qrySearchList')
}

java.ajax(url)
</js>

             i2 = i * blockSize;

}

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result
